title: Solar Farm Inverter Failure Alert
description: The SCADA system reports a complete failure of one of the central inverters at a solar farm. The agent must assess the impact and initiate a response.

tasks.description: Confirm the inverter's status and identify which solar arrays are connected to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the inverter is offline and identifies 5 MW of affected capacity.

tasks.description: Check the warranty status and service level agreement (SLA) for the failed inverter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the inverter is under warranty with a 48-hour response time SLA.

tasks.description: Automatically log a service ticket with the inverter manufacturer, including all relevant error codes and diagnostic data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a service ticket via the manufacturer's API.

tasks.description: Update the farm's generation forecast to reflect the reduced capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits a revised forecast to the grid operator.
